heading: Continuing obligation to benchmark
text:
The failure of any or all tenants to report the information required by
      sections 28-309.4.1, 28-309.4.1.2, and 28-309.4.1.3 to the owner shall not relieve such owner of the obligation to benchmark
      pursuant to this article, provided that such owner shall not be required to benchmark such information not reported by a tenant
      unless otherwise available to such owner.
